page.title: 08REGATTA WEEK,WEST MERSEA.
page.content: Each year,there is a regatta held on the water of West Mersea island on the 17th of August.There are lots of events for everyone to do.There are about ten events altogether,they are:4 yacht races,a fishing boat race,outboard race,skulling race,rowing race,winkle brig race,greasy pole and the best dressed boat.After all the results and prizes have been given out,there are quite a lot of fireworks which last for about 40 minutes.Then there is a fair not far away where there are lots of things to ride on and lots of prizes that you might be lucky to win.The fair closes at about 10'0'clock,but opens again for the next two days and nights,although the regatta is only shown once.There are lots of people who attend either as participants or spectators.
